greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Largest number in the orbit of n under iteration of the map A125256: x -> smallest odd prime divisor of n^2+1.
comment: The orbit (or trajectory) under A125256 appears to end in the cycle 5 -> 13 -> 5 -> etc. for any initial value n.
link: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..20001
mathematica: Table[Max[NestWhileList[SelectFirst[FactorInteger[#^2+1][[All,1]], OddQ]&, n,#!=13&]],{n,2,60}] (* Requires Mathematica version 10 or later *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 04 2019 *)
xref: Cf. A125256, A294656 (size of the orbit).
results.author: _M. F. Hasler_, Nov 06 2017
